seasonalMultipliers.title: Seasonal Multipliers

form.createDescription: Add a new seasonal multiplier for a specific period.
form.name: Name
form.multiplierHelp: Price will be multiplied by this value (0.1x to 3.0x)
form.priorityHelp: Higher priority takes precedence when periods overlap

errors.nameTooLong: Name must be 100 characters or less
errors.endDateBeforeStart: End date must be after start date

delete.title: Delete Multiplier

timeBuckets.title: MAD Time Buckets
timeBuckets.description: Configure fixed prices per duration tier for mise-à-disposition

form.createDescription: Add a fixed price for a mise-à-disposition duration.
form.isActiveHelp: Only active buckets are used for pricing

errors.durationRange: Duration must be between 1 and 24 hours
errors.duplicateBucket: A bucket for this duration and category already exists

delete.title: Delete Bucket
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this {duration}h bucket? This action cannot be undone.

empty.title: No buckets configured
empty.description: Create your first time bucket to define fixed prices per mise-à-disposition duration.

interpolation.title: Interpolation Strategy
interpolation.description: Defines how to calculate price for durations between buckets

strategy.ROUND_UP_desc: Uses the higher bucket price (e.g., 5h → 6h price)
strategy.ROUND_DOWN_desc: Uses the lower bucket price (e.g., 5h → 4h price)
strategy.PROPORTIONAL_desc: Linearly interpolates between the two buckets

adjustments.title: Pricing Adjustments
adjustments.description: Manage seasonal multipliers and time-based rate modifiers

extras.title: Extras & Promotions
extras.description: Manage optional fees and promotional discounts for quotes

advanced.title: Advanced Pricing Settings
advanced.description: Configure advanced pricing and operational options for your organization

zoneResolution.title: Zone Resolution
zoneResolution.description: Configure how the system resolves zone conflicts and combines multipliers

complianceStaffing.title: Compliance & Staffing
complianceStaffing.description: Configure staffing selection policy and associated costs for long missions

timeBasedPricing.title: Time-Based Pricing
timeBasedPricing.description: Configure time and duration-based calculation options

clientScoring.title: Client Scoring
clientScoring.warning: Difficulty multipliers are automatically applied to quotes for clients with a defined difficulty score. Use this feature with caution.

transferToMad.title: Transfer/MAD Thresholds
transferToMad.description: Configure thresholds for automatic transfer-to-MAD pricing suggestions
transferToMad.denseZoneDescription: Suggest MAD pricing when commercial speed is too low in dense zones
transferToMad.roundTripDescription: Suggest MAD pricing when driver is blocked on-site during round-trips

zoneConflictStrategy.label: Zone conflict resolution strategy
zoneConflictStrategy.help: Determines how the system chooses a zone when a point falls within multiple overlapping zones

options.MOST_EXPENSIVE: Most expensive wins (zone with highest multiplier)

zoneMultiplierAggregation.label: Zone multiplier aggregation
zoneMultiplierAggregation.help: Determines how pickup and dropoff zone multipliers are combined

staffingSelectionPolicy.label: Staffing selection policy
staffingSelectionPolicy.help: Determines how the system selects the best staffing plan when RSE violations are detected

useDriverHomeForDeadhead.label: Use driver home for deadhead
useDriverHomeForDeadhead.description: When enabled and driver has a configured home location, use it instead of vehicle base
useDriverHomeForDeadhead.help: Enables more accurate deadhead calculations based on driver's actual position

timeBucketInterpolation.label: Time bucket interpolation strategy
timeBucketInterpolation.help: Determines how to calculate price when requested duration falls between defined buckets

denseZoneSpeedThreshold.label: Speed threshold
denseZoneSpeedThreshold.help: Commercial speed below which MAD pricing is suggested (km/h)

autoSwitchToMAD.label: Auto-switch to MAD
autoSwitchToMAD.description: Automatically switch to MAD pricing instead of just suggesting

denseZoneCodes.label: Dense zone codes
denseZoneCodes.help: Zone codes considered as dense zones for detection

minWaitingTimeForSeparateTransfers.label: Min waiting time for separate transfers
minWaitingTimeForSeparateTransfers.help: Minimum on-site waiting time (minutes) for 2 separate transfers to be viable

maxReturnDistanceKm.label: Max return distance
maxReturnDistanceKm.help: Maximum distance (km) to consider returning to base

roundTripBuffer.label: Round-trip buffer
roundTripBuffer.help: Buffer time (minutes) added to return calculation

autoSwitchRoundTripToMAD.label: Auto-switch round-trip to MAD
autoSwitchRoundTripToMAD.description: Automatically switch round-trips to MAD pricing instead of just suggesting

zoneManagement.title: Zone management
zoneManagement.description: Configure fixed surcharges per zone (parking, access)

fleetSettings.title: Fleet settings
fleetSettings.description: Configure RSE rules and license categories

dispoPackages.title: Dispo packages
dispoPackages.description: Configure time buckets and MAD prices

advancedRates.title: Time-Based Rates
advancedRates.description: Configure price adjustments based on time conditions

licenseCategories.description: Define license categories for drivers and vehicle requirements.

costParameters.title: Cost Parameters
costParameters.description: Configure base rates, margins, and operational costs for pricing calculations.

fields.orangeMarginThresholdHelp: Margin below this is a loss (red)
fields.zoneConflictStrategyHelp: Determines which zone is selected when a point falls within multiple overlapping zones
fields.zoneMultiplierAggregationStrategyHelp: Determines how pickup and dropoff zone multipliers are combined
fields.staffingSelectionPolicyHelp: Determines how the system selects the best staffing plan when RSE violations are detected
fields.hotelCostPerNightHelp: Cost of one hotel night for the driver (default: 100€)
fields.mealCostPerDayHelp: Daily meal allowance for the driver (default: 30€)
fields.driverOvernightPremiumHelp: Premium paid to driver for overnight missions (default: 50€)
fields.secondDriverHourlyRateHelp: Hourly cost for second driver (double crew/relay) (default: 25€)
fields.relayDriverFixedFeeHelp: Fixed fee for arranging a relay driver (default: 150€)

warnings.zeroMarginThreshold: Zero margin threshold may cause all quotes to show as profitable
warnings.missingOperationalCosts: Some operational cost parameters are missing
